result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Avion K Howard
Current: 3301 Leopold Way #107, Fitchburg, WI 53713 United States  (Effective: 08-08-2022)
Prior: 1819 Aberg Ave, Madison, WI 53704

9:23 AM ADA Colleen Lennon in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Avion K Howard in court with Attorney Jacob Wise, making a special appearance. Attorney Wise makes statement in support of Motion to quash warrant. Defendant provides updated address. State has no objection to warrant being quashed. Court withdraws warrant and adds condition of No Operating any motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. All other conditions remain the same. Defendant to report to SPD today to apply for attorney on this case.
Status conference on September 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
As of 3:00 pm Defendant has not apeared. State requests $500 BW

09:05 AM Defendant appeared.  Trisha L Simmons appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
